title: Drawing, "Project for Decoration of Ceiling"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light green laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on the recto: Bacco, Cerere, Ganimede, Ebe, Primavera Estate, Autunno Inverno.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Four rhombus with Bacchus, Cerere, Ganymede, Hebe; two tondi with the Seasons; thirteen tondi with cupids; seven decorative folders; octagonal with masks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for Decoration of Ceiling".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light green laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1632.
